long_description: This mixed 4-pack of NUUN Active hydration tablets contains fruity flavors that are loaded with electrolytes, vitamins and minerals to help you stay properly hydrated throughout the day! Variety pack contains 1 tube each of Grape, Fruit Punch, Tropical, and Strawberry Lemonade; 12 tablets per tube. Just drop 1 tablet into 16 fl. oz. of water, wait 2 min., drink and presto-optimum hydration. NUUN doesn't contain sugar or carbohydrates, so there's no need to worry about the extra calories usually found in sport drinks. Tablets are stored in 1.25 x 4 in. plastic tubes that easily fit into a backpack or jacket pocket. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This mixed 4-pack of NUUN Active hydration tablets contains fruity flavors that are loaded with electrolytes, vitamins and minerals to help you stay properly hydrated throughout the day!
